item.title: Alissa add a quote by Bill Nye
item.description: "Everyone you will ever meet knows something you don't." -- Bill Nye

item.title: Alissa add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Everyone looks retarded once you set your mind to it." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Alissa add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "I haven't the slightest idea how to change people, but still I keep a long list of prospective candidates just in case I should ever figure it out." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Alissa add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Real love amounts to withholding the truth, even when you're offered the perfect opportunity to hurt someone's feelings" -- David Sedaris

item.title: Alissa add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "When shit brings you down, just say 'fuck it', and eat yourself some motherfucking candy." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Alissa add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "For the first twenty years of my life, I rocked myself to sleep. It was a harmless enough hobby, but eventually, I had to give it up. Throughout the next twenty-two years I lay still and discovered that after a few minutes I could drop off with no problem. Follow seven beers with a couple of scotches and a thimble of good marijuana, and it’s funny how sleep just sort of comes on its own. Often I never even made it to the bed. I’d squat down to pet the cat and wake up on the floor eight hours later, having lost a perfectly good excuse to change my clothes. I’m now told that this is not called “going to sleep” but rather “passing out,” a phrase that carries a distinct hint of judgment." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Sarah Vowell
item.description: "I talk about going to [George W. Bush's] Inauguration and crying when he took the oath, 'cause I was so afraid he was going to wreck the economy and muck up the drinking water'... the failure of my pessimistic imagination at that moment boggles my mind now." -- Sarah Vowell

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Sarah Vowell
item.description: "We are flawed creatures, all of us. Some of us think that means we should fix our flaws. But get rid of my flaws and there would be no one left." -- Sarah Vowell

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Sarah Vowell
item.description: "Along with voting, jury duty, and paying taxes, goofing off is one of the central obligations of American citizenship." -- Sarah Vowell
